messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: ... The boards are archived at: http://www.archive.org/web/web.php Just type in the http://www.nschooling.com address into the search box and click Go. The
messages.messageBody:
On Apr 24, 2005, at 2:20 PM, Nichole wrote:

> What are they doing with all those archives? Any clue?

The boards are archived at:

http://www.archive.org/web/web.php

Just type in the http://www.nschooling.com address into the search box
and click Go.

The most recent archive should have all the posts that were on the
boards at the time.

When the site was down some months ago they lost a bunch of old posts.
I assume they're in the archive right before the big loss.

Joyce

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: ... **You can still get to them at the Wayback Machine website: http://web.archive.org/web/*/http:/www.unschooling.com. ~Rue [Non-text portions of this message
messages.messageBody:
>>What are they doing with all those archives? Any clue?

**You can still get to them at the Wayback Machine website:
http://web.archive.org/web/*/http:/www.unschooling.com. ~Rue

messages.messageBody:
What are they doing with all those archives? Any clue?

Nichole
----- Original Message -----
From: Rue Kream
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, April 24, 2005 10:23 AM
Subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling.com


>>why the
message boards are down at unschooling.com?

**Hi Becky - They're re-doing the site and decided to take the message
boards down. There's a message board at http://www.unschooling.info/, and
you'll find lots of the same people there. ~Rue

messages.subject: Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I m briefly coming out of lurkerdom to ask whether anyone knows why the message boards are down at unschooling.com? Thanks, Becky
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I'm briefly coming out of lurkerdom to ask whether anyone knows why the
message boards are down at unschooling.com?

Thanks,
Becky
